amendment.description: Amendment provides for the establishment within the Federal Election Commission of a clearinghouse of public information regarding the political activities of foreign principals and agents of foreign principals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to establish a clearinghous of information on political activities within the Federal Election Commission.
